wikipedia_page.main: Alasdair Dickinson (born 11 September 1983 in Dundee) is a Scottish rugby union coach.  He was previously a Scotland international rugby union player; and played for the clubs Edinburgh Rugby, Gloucester and Sale Sharks.  He played as a prop.

response: Squad announced 14 August 2007.SRU On 11 September, his 24th birthday, Alasdair Dickinson was called up to the Scotland squad to replace the injured Allan Jacobsen.Dickinson called up
